QuestData.Title: Show Gnomercy
QuestData.Description: Spark must be brought to justice!$B$BI need you to go down to the beach and find that deceitful gnome. Once you find him, get whatever information you can out of him!$B$BIf a high ranking official of the Alliance has committed treasonous acts, who knows how many others are corrupt?$B$BAnd $n, use force if you have to...
QuestData.LogDescription: Admiral Odesyus at Odesyus' Landing wants you to recover the Traitor's Communication from Engineer "Spark" Overgrind.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find the lying dog?
QuestData.RewardText: Incredible! This was all part of their master plan!$B$BThis information must reach the king and your own leaders. The implications are staggering.
